name: Hellcrap
description: Two levels I started making two years ago I think, with the plan of using them for a bigger megawad. Although it was a long time since I last worked on this project (which I doubt I'll ever finish) and decided to release them. Maybe I'll do more small packs of smaller WADs or single maps in the future. Theme: Marble and Hell. You got beat the crap out of the monsters. Beat the hell crap!
